maps.title: Slow Shore Shuffle
maps.description: Roam the shoreline of Staten Island — reload to start again elsewhere.

maps.title: The Thick Boundary of New York City
maps.description: Outlines of the city as identified by different agencies, histories, and data collection methods are compiled. Together, they illustrate the thickness of the city’s perimeter and its many imaginings.

maps.title: Identifying Darkness
maps.description: Press and hold to toggle modes. Swipe or press the spacebar to change scale.

maps.title: Points and Polygons
maps.description: Click to isolate a system. Swipe or press spacebar to change modes.

maps.title: Tileswap
maps.description: Pan around, exploring the reconfigured aerial imagery of New York City.

maps.title: From City Island
maps.description: What public transit lines are directly available from any point in the city? Click to select a new point. Drag to reveal the aerial imagery.

maps.title: Finding Green
maps.description: An aerial image of Randall’s Island is divided into subdivisions and the pixels within each are sorted by their hue value. Move the cursor to reveal and hide the originating image.

maps.title: New York I Love You
maps.description: Hover over a track to hear different field recordings of the LCD Soundsystem song, “New York I Love You, But You’re Bringing Me Down”.

maps.title: Measuring Light
maps.description: Click the buttons to change between sampling point representations.

maps.title: Dominant Forms: Area
maps.description: Buildings are grouped by footprint size. Hover to isolate each group.

maps.title: Looking Up
maps.description: Hover to reveal the GPS accuracy at each point where a photo was taken.

maps.title: A Walk Three Ways
maps.description: Scrub along the altitude graph, pan within the aerial, or scrub along the path to update all views.

maps.title: Subway Stream
maps.description: Watch advertisements from subway stations whiz by like passing trains.

maps.title: Looking Down
maps.description: Hover to reveal an image of the sky corresponding to point on the ground.
